abstract: Amid the ongoing parlor game of who will replace Kenneth D. Lewis as Bank of America’s next chief, Bloomberg News reported that the bank was most likely to tap someone from its own ranks for the job.
snippet: Amid the ongoing parlor game of who will replace Kenneth D. Lewis as Bank of America’s next chief, Bloomberg News reported that the bank was most likely to tap someone from its own ranks for the job.
lead_paragraph: In the ongoing parlor game of who will replace Kenneth D. Lewis as Bank of America‘s next chief, Bloomberg News reported that the bank is most likely to tap someone from its own ranks for the top job.

headline.main: Bank of America Said to Look Inside for C.E.O.
